alert.note: Alert for Baca; Bent; Las Animas; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 29 at 4:00PM MDT until April 29 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Western Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Northwestern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... East central Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 359 PM MDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Lamar to 12 miles southeast of Higbee, moving south at 55 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Two Buttes and Two Buttes Reservoir. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
